网易和暴雪的合作终止，中国大陆众多玩家失去了自己的游戏资格以及账号内的财产，这是非常不公平的一件事。现如今，守望2上架Steam，大陆注册的暴雪账号依然无法登陆，这是更加不公平的一件事。这些行动，是暴雪对人类文明底层价值的挑战，让人感到愤怒。有良知的人类不得不通过合法的渠道来表达他们对暴雪犯罪行为的不满。暴雪如果在这里获得好评，中国大陆的玩家就失去了自己的尊严。

ow1结束之后我就基本上不玩了，我大半个青春都在这里，谁能有一个又一个的六年。其实我也知道有亚服有外服，但是觉得对我来说也没什么意义，最喜欢的游戏也早就变味，但是通过游戏认识的很多好朋友还在，就值得.
但是暴雪我还是草你吗的，我的天使全皮肤，我的金枪百合，我的粉红天使我的各种限定绝版联赛皮肤，我框框充进去的钱，我的数据和回忆，暴雪我杀你全家你马全死了。一手好牌打的稀烂，联赛也乱七八糟。真的该死，恨死暴雪了。
再也没有那个夏天，再也没有游戏能让我定闹钟半夜起来盼着更新，再也没有什么游戏能让我心情不好的时候单排一晚上通宵都不会觉得累。该骂的早就骂完了，好就好在还剩些漂亮的回忆，到此为止咯。

[h1] TDLR; Good Base Game, Horrible Everything Else [/h1]

[b] Coming from a long time player [/b]
I bought and played Overwatch during the golden days, it was fun. While it can still be fun OW2 is a completely unwarranted sequel with a horrendous monetization model, questionable decision making and built on a pile of lies. Don't get this game, save yourself from misery.

[b] Monetization [/b]
In OW1 you could get every other cosmetic in the game just by playing and opening lootboxes. Sure it was bad but I'd take it over a BP any day. You got a box every level and for endorsement levels too, so I amassed quite the collection. OW2 cosmetics are so few and far between unless you pay I can physically count any worthwhile skins that I got in OW2 with my fingers. (And no, heroes being unlockable after a BP season does not mean its free, you have to spend time to grind it.)

[b] Questionable Balancing/Feedback [/b]
Sometimes it really feels like the dev team takes a wheel of fortune and spins for which characters to buff/nerf. For example, Doomfist a hero that is considered buggy and consistently poorly performing by the community, got a buff in S2. Unfortunately, his spot in the limelight lasted a literal week as he was nerfed back to what he now is. The balance team always has this oddly roundabout approach to balancing, ignoring the elephant in the room for a more "safe" option (Cassidy, Mercy, etc.)

[b] Lies [/b]
Remember the entire reason OW2 was going to be released as a sequel, the PVE with Hero Trees? Whoops! It doesn't exist now! Now it's separated into smaller PVE missions with less content, and you have to pay 15 bucks for each part, what a steal! Funnily enough they scammed their customers on steam who bought the invasion bundle, which didn't register to their account even after purchase. 

I love this game, but God Blizzard makes it really hard for me to continue liking this game with the predatory monetization, blatant false advertising and just overall disappointing treatment of the great IP that is Overwatch. This game is going downhill, so they moved the game to steam in hopes that it would create more player retention. Sad to say, but this desperate attempt isn't getting POTG anytime soon.
